title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 801.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 801.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the responsibilities
for providers of Part 816 Medically Managed Detoxification Services and

Inpatient Medically Supervised Withdrawal Services, Part 818 Chemical

Dependence Inpatient Rehabilitation Services and Part 822 Chemical Dependence

Outpatient and Opioid Treatment Services of this Title regarding behavioral
health organizations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
801.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
